p: ReFocus Eye Health in Stamford, CT is seeking a highly motivated and technically skilled individual to serve as the SQL DBA/BI Developer for our growing organization. This is an exciting opportunity for a dedicated, analytically minded individual with an aptitude for providing business intelligence solutions.
p.3: =C2=B7 Partner with business leads to identify and assess system and business requirements
p.4: =C2=B7 Build and manage SQL Servers and databases
p.5: =C2=B7 Data collection across multiple application databases into a data warehouse
p.6: =C2=B7 Develop and manage advanced reporting, analytics, dashboards and other BI solutions
p.7: =C2=B7 Develop, implement and optimize SQL stored procedures, queries and functions
p.8: =C2=B7 Create technical solutions to satisfy business needs; create data storage tools, conduct unit tests and develop database queries
p.9: =C2=B7 Review and interpret ongoing reporting requirements
p.10: =C2=B7 Develop, document, and maintain standards for data storage and retrieval within multiple systems to ensure data consistency and integrity
p.11: =C2=B7 Develop procedures, scripts and test routines for data migration
p.12: =C2=B7 Create database triggers and other data automation routines
p.13: =C2=B7 Develop and support systems integration workflows between application databases
p.14: =C2=B7 Create operational dashboards and other visualization tools to support financial and operational business needs
p.15: =C2=B7 Implement best practices regarding data definition, data quality, data security and data integration
p.16: =C2=B7 Document all architecture and configuration settings
p.20: =C2=B7 BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
p.21: =C2=B7Knowledge of Data Warehouse and ETL design
p.22: =C2=B7 In-depth knowledge of relational database theory and SQL procedures including writing complex SQL queries and stored procedures; backups, restores and recovery models; and performance tuning techniques
p.23: =C2=B7 Experience in developing and managing business intelligence dashboards, analytics, administration and architecture in Power BI, Tableau or similar visualization tool
p.30: ***Please note that some travel will be required between practice locations.
p.32: A cover letter isn=E2=80=99t necessary, but we=E2=80=99d appreciate a brief answer to these two questions:
p.36: We look forward to getting to know you!

strong: ****ReFocus is offering a generous benefits and compensation package to the right candidate.
text: ReFocus Eye Health isn=E2=80=99t just vision. It=E2=80=99s visionary. We=E2=80=99re funded by Zenyth Partners, a permanent capital investment firm committed to providing transformative solutions that address the changing needs of healthcare. Together with Zenyth, we=E2=80=99re growing practices strategically through proven business expertise while continually elevating the quality of patient care.
